channel.title: consume on Adil Houmadi
channel.description: Recent content in consume on Adil Houmadi

item.title: Consume and produce data from/to Apache Kafka using CLI
item.description: In this series of articles we will see the different methods that we can use in order to produce data to a topic, and the way to consume it. We will start by setting up a local environment using docker and docker-compose. Once the kafka ecosystem is ready we will create a topic, than produce some data and consume it via CLI.
